import React, { Component } from 'react' import TopNavbar from '../TopNavbar/TopNavbar' import BottomNavbar from '../BottomNavbar/BottomNavbar' import './membersReflection.css' export default class membersReflection extends Component { render() { return (

David Chong (2016 class of Leland High School)

“Share the Love through Music.” That’s our mission. Although AYM is comprised of youth high school and middle school students, it is full of compassion and service. In hindsight, I am proud of the efforts of AYM; we helped our community by performing for senior centers, rehabilitation centers, and fundraisers. One distinct incident proved to me that we were truly comforting people with music. After performing Wonderful Peace and The More Love to Thee an elderly woman came up to me. She smiled warmly and said, “ It’s been so long since I’ve heard those hymns. Thank you so much for sharing them with me.” Later, I met an elderly man and found out that he graduated from Leland High School; AYM was not only connecting with others through music, but also simply taking the initiative to help locals. Initially, I didn’t know if our performances were helping anyone’ if it were not for the elderly woman, I would have continued to believe our music was meaningless. I know AYM is still young, however, I hope it grows and matures, continuing to “share the love through music” as I have learned to.

) } }
